ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] SoT Question
ygData.msgSnippet: A bard in my guild swears that you get the old secondary resist properties (ie way too many of them) if you equip wind instruments. I never bother too equip
ygData.messageBody:
A bard in my guild swears that you get the "old" secondary resist properties
(ie way too many of them) if you equip wind instruments. I never bother too
equip wind (15% more mezzmerised? it lowers mob's mr but is that worth it?
not for me.)

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2001 4:49 PM
To: EQ Bards
Subject: [eqbards] SoT Question


What do you all suggest for Song of Twilight - equipping the 7-string Lute
for the +15 Charisma or a Mino Horn for the Wind effect?

Slyde



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
